name: Stream Santa
description:
A Twitch-exclusive co-op game between the Streamer and Twitch Chat! Make presents and save Christmas!

It's January, and lots of presents need to be made. It's up to the Streamer and Twitch Chat to work together. The Streamer plays as Santa, and Twitch Chat are the Elves. Every month leading up to Christmas, you must work as a team and produce the right kinds of presents. 

See this trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rn1THxHc-sY

Designed for 10-100000 viewers.
